== Cheruvannur (CT) (627436) ==

Cheruvannur (CT) is a town in the [[Kozhikode]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 10.31 sq. km. and harbouring 12319 households with total population of 61614 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 9 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 425 km. Male population is 29777 and female population is 31837. Scheduled Caste population is 2170 and Scheduled Tribes population is 57. Census Location Code of the town is 627436<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class II (population_total 50,000 to 99,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 9 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 9 km. Railway station is at Feroke at a distance of 3 km.
